about.title: ABOUT
about.description: Veigar Bot is a Discord support bot. It tries to provide the most intuitive and efficient environment for any support server. The bot's objective is to minimize all wasted time by going straight to supporting instead.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.description: If you want to contact the developer, submit a bug, suggest a feature, or simply just talk about my other work, join the bot's server or add StylexTV#5755.

footer.text: Website and bot were made with ‚ù§ by StylexTV.

commandsDesc.play: Play a song with a given url.
